name: Pong Collection (Prototype, still in development)
description:
Note: If playing in two player mode, it is recommended that you use full-screen mode, as the up and down arrow keys, which control the second player, will otherwise also scroll the page up and down.

Player 1: W and S to move up and down.

Player 2: Up and Down arrow keys to move up and down.

Use Z or ENTER to navigate through menus.

Currently there's only Classic Pong, but I intend to add several different modes that are variations on Pong's gameplay, which will hopefully put an interesting spin on this classic.
